answers.answer: Good luck....just 6 more hours and you will have her!
she will be definetely be ok..wish u good luck...
Good Luck sweetie!!! Everything will be ok....Take care :)
I am praying for you and your wee one right now.  Happy birthday, may God Bless you and keep you both.
Oh, I know you are so excited!  How many weeks are you?  What will her name be?

thank you so much for your kind words.  i am 37wks3days today.  her name will be Antonia Marie (I'm naming her after my dad Anthony).  You'd think i wouldn't be so nervous with this being baby number 3, but gosh i feel so anxious.  i guess it's new everytime, huh?
Beautiful name for a beautiful girl.
Best wishes!!  Hope all goes well! :)  God Bless!
congrats and hope for a speedy and safe delivery!

thank you again.  i have to be at the hospital in 2 hrs and am going nuts waiting.  i will finally get to see my little one today, i just wasn't expecting it.  i have a wonderful doctor who delivered my son and i have full faith in her.  you guys have been a great support during this pregnancy, and i want to thank everyone for that.
i bet you are going nuts. to have a scheduled birth would be hard to do if it wasnt like 6 am! just wake and go.
we should have had her dh post and let us know haha

question: today i went to my diabetes specialist for a routine nst and d/t all the issues i've been having (high bp, bleeding, baby has decreased movement, headaches) both my drs want my little one out today.  i go in for surgery in about 4hrs to deliver in 6hrs.  i am so nervous.  i just hope she will be okay.
title: Wish me Luck!
